mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{name}, user_pwd = #{pwd},user_gender = #{gender} ,user_signature = #{signature}, user_phone = #{phone} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) as userCount,user_position as userPosition from user group by userPosition
